level.text: All meetings of the NPC, including special meetings of Boards, shall be open to the public.

Notice of the date, time, and place of every meeting of the Board and, in the case of a special meeting, of the purpose or purposes for which the meeting is called, shall be given to Board Members at least five (5) days prior to the meeting and the notice shall be posted in NPC headquarters.
Whenever possible, mass media shall be used.
A quorum at any meeting of the Board shall consist of not less than one-third (1/3) of the Board’s members.
